Plot: The Rocker tells the story of a failed drummer who is given a second chance at fame. Robert "Fish" Fishman is the extremely dedicated and astoundingly passionate drummer for the eighties ...
Title: The Rocker
Actors: Rainn Wilson, Christina Applegate, Teddy Geiger, Josh Gad
Writer: Maya Forbes (screenplay), Wallace Wolodarsky (screenplay), Ryan Jaffe (story)
